Today, Cornwall is lighting up with clean conditions! North spots like Crantock and Fistral are offering fun 5ft @ 7s W with a moderate 12 mph WNW wind, best enjoyed from early to mid-afternoon. The South is also looking good, with Porthcurno and Praa Sands showing 3ft @ 6s W and light winds, perfect for a mellow session. Over on the West, Sennen Cove and Gwenvor are producing 4ft @ 7s W, with a light 10 mph W wind, making for a great day to hit the beach. Best: today!
